analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/32/0xcf91ddfd551c8eee7dc88372acd8c49a0d8726a3.sol:
	Contract Alecrypto has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/32/0xcf91ddfd551c8eee7dc88372acd8c49a0d8726a3.sol#206-207)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/32/0xcf91ddfd551c8eee7dc88372acd8c49a0d8726a3.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/32/0xcf91ddfd551c8eee7dc88372acd8c49a0d8726a3.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/32/0xcf91ddfd551c8eee7dc88372acd8c49a0d8726a3.sol#78) is not in mixedCase
